name: Charlie's Startup
description:
Charlie's Startup is a visual novel where you follow the story of Charlie. They are a new business owner, and they are on the search for a logo for their shop. Help Charlie look through different artists and logos to help get his business going.

This is made by Dexter N. Buenaventura and Celina Guillermo as part of their Capstone (MMACAP2) class. After playing through this project, please fill up the Google Form below. Please now that this is all for educational purposes only. For any questions, feel free to contact us

Dexter N. Buenaventura | dexter.buenaventura@benilde.edu.ph

Celina Guillermo | celina.guillermo@benilde.edu.ph

https://forms.gle/Ln2i7H66uXtF5Xgu9
